The Evillious Chronicles:
Original Sin Story Timeline

A false prediction of the future,
…And so the world is being warped.
—Queen Of The Glass

Events from the First Period to EC 015.

First Period

  • First Period scientists create the virtual reality the Second Period.[1]
  • Behemo Barisol creates his Second Period avatar, Levia Barisol.[1]
  • Behemo begins dating a maid who works for his household.[2]
  • First Period scientists introduce Hereditary Evil Raiser (HER) Syndrome into the Second Period.[1]
  • Behemo is contacted by Levia[2] and creates a new avatar in the Second Period, this time identical to himself.[1]
  • Civilization in the First Period is destroyed.[1]

Second Period

  • The Second Period is created by First Period scientists.[1]
  • Levia, a child prodigy, enters college at the age of six.[2]
  • The world begins to be infected by "malice".[1]
  • Levia begins working for the scientist Held Yggdra, eventually learning that Malice is from another world.[2]
  • A girl infected by malice flips a switch and kills her father[3] and is sent to Held's institute in Russia.[4]
  • Scientists realize the world will be overrun by HER and set up teams of scientists to embark on ships to reach inhabitable planets.[2]
  • Levia begins suffering from Malice.[2]
  • In an attempt to stop her murder impulses, Levia goes to "another world" to kill her other self on the advice of Seth Twiright.[2][1]
  • Levia makes contact with Behemo Barisol, but chooses not to kill him.[2]
  • Behemo arrives in the Second Period.[1]
  • The girl admitted to the institute commits suicide.[4]
  • The spaceship "Climb One" departs from Earth with 72 scientists aboard.[4][2] They then lose contact with all other ships.[4] Behemo facilitates the Climb One's arrival into the destroyed First Period.[1]

Before BT 528

  • The Climb One arrives in the destroyed First Period.[1]
  • The scientists on the Climb One begin rebuilding the world.[4]
  • Seth Twiright instigates the deaths of all but ten of the scientists.[4]
  • The Climb One crashes into Earth as scientists argue over managment of the new world, killing the surviving crew and trapping their spirit data inside.[4]

BT 528

  • Held and TALOS escape the ship and reincarnate into the bat god Sickle and the tree god Held; the dead scientists are reincarnated into Held's forest spirits.[4]

Between BT 528 and BT 022

  • Humans in Levianta discover abandoned Second Period technology, including the Climb One, which they call "Sin". Upon hearing the voices of the twin dragon gods Levia-Behemo, they bring Sin out of the Earth and into a temple.
  • Seth Twiright, having escaped the ark,[4] creates artificial humans with HER syndrome known as "Ghoul Children", including Pale Noël and Kiril Clockworker.
  • The prophet Maria Moonlit becomes Queen Merry-Go-Round of Levianta.[5]

BT 022

  • Adam Moonlit is born as the son of Maria Moonlit.[6]
  • Meta Salmhofer is created by Seth Twiright.[6]

BT 021

  • Eve Zvezda is born.[6]

BT 007

  • January 30: Elluka Chirclatia is born.[6]

BT 004

  • Irina Clockworker is created by Seth as his twelfth Ghould Child; he inputs her as Kiril's younger sister.[6]

BT 002

  • Meta falls in love with Pale Noël leader of the organization Apocalypse and joins their ranks.[5]
  • Apocalypse commits many crimes across Levianta.[5]

Circa EC 000

  • Prophet Merry-Go-Round is told by her "parents" Levia-Behemo that the world will be destroyed unless they are reincarnated into humans.[7][5]
  • Project "Ma" is established to find suitable vessels for the twin gods to inhabit, headed by Merry-Go-Round's son, Adam Moonlit.[5]
  • Eve Zvezda is chosen as the first "Ma" candidate, who is brainwashed by Adam.[8][5]
  • Eve's twins Cain and Abel are stillborn,[5] and Eve and Adam run away to Held's Forest.[8] Seth Twiright then becomes the new head scientist for Project "Ma".[8][5]

EC 000

  • Apocalypse's Meta Salmhofer is captured.[9][5] Seth frees her from prison in exchange for becoming the next Ma.[9]
  • Hänsel and Gretel are born,[9][6] and Prophet Merry-Go-Round establishes the Evillious Calendar.[5]
  • Meta runs away with her two children into Held's Forest.[9][5] Seth is dismissed from Project "Ma" for his past experiments on Ghoul Children.[5]

EC 001

  • While Meta is on a walk with Hänsel and Gretel, the two children are stolen by Eve Moonlit.[9][10] Meta is murdered by Eve in her delusion[10][11][6], and Adam and Eve adopt the twins.[10]

Between EC 001 and EC 013

  • The third Project Ma is stopped midway when the candidate dies due to her fraility.[12]
  • The fourth Project Ma is abandoned after Apocalypse murders the candidate.[12]
  • The fifth Ma candidate is killed after she fails to give birth to twins.[12]
  • The sixth Ma candidate is abducted by her husband, Wei Lucif, during her pregnancy. Her corpse is later found in Nemu village.[12]
  • Elluka Chirclatia is driven out of her work as a priestess in Lighwatch for delinquent behavior.[12] She cures Kiril of his hers and the two get engaged.

EC 011

  • Milky Eights gives birth to Pale Noel's child.[13]

EC 013

  • The seventh Project "Ma" begins with four candidates: Elluka Chirclatia, Irina Clockworker, Ly Li, and Milky Eights.[13][12]
  • Ly Li dies from falling off a cliff.[13]
  • Milky Eights dies from a hanging.[13]
  • Elluka is murdered by her sister-in-law Irina.[13]
  • Irina is chosen to be Ma as the sole remaining candidate.[13]
  • A heartbroken Kiril brings Elluka's corpse to "Sin" inside the temple[14] at the beckoning of Levia-Behemo's voices.[4] Levia and Behemo reincarnate into Elluka's body,[4] causing a great explosion in the temple.[14][12] The twin-headed dragon escapes the ark and begins destroying the Magic Kingdom Levianta and surrounding countries in the Levianta Catastrophe.[6][12][11] An amnesiac Levia takes over as the dominant personality inside Elluka's body and impersonating the sorcereress, taking her fiancé's last name.[14] The dying Irina is approached by Seth Twiright, who places her soul into the body of a red plush cat.[15] Two fragments of the dragon fall to Held's forest[14] and merge with Hänsel and Gretel's souls.

EC 014

  • A great famine occurs as a result of the Levianta Catastrophe.[11]
  • Adam and Eve abandon Hänsel and Gretel in the forest.[16]. Hänsel and Gretel find their way back home and murder their parents, who they believe to be a "witch" and her "henchman".[16][11] The twins split Eve's soul into seven fragments and perform a Re_birthday[1] to create six of the Demons of Sin.[17][6] They then scatter the sins throughout the world.[11][17][6]

EC 015

  • Held tasks Elluka with collecting the Seven Vessels of Sin[11][17][6][18] to keep the twin gods busy.
